title: Dark Star J4 Skin Bug
body: After Patch 8.5 was released, Dark Star Jarvan's voice lines have been the same as his default skin(s), rather than the modified voice lines for the skin in 8.4.

replies.body:
Hey charming boy, 

This was a result of the back end audio changes you may have been hearing about (particularly that patches are going to be larger for the next few patches to pick up all of these changes. :o) He'll have his processing back in 8.6 as soon as the patch goes live. Sorry for the delay. ;-;
